thread.section_title: Fast Cover Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Cover Travel Insurance | fastcover.com.au
thread.title: Pamela
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by Pamela

author: Pamela
title: Pamela
text:
I am in the process of arranging a trip to South America and Antarctica. I needed insurance and wanted some clarification of the fine details. The lady I spoke with on the telephone was most helpful and after speaking with her I felt comfortable purchasing the policy I needed on line. At the time I purchased the policy there was also a 'special' offered and I got a good deal. Would not hesitate to purchase another policy from Fast Cover for further travels.
The true value of the policy will only be revealed if a claim has to be made, which I have no intention of making, and how that claim is handled.
